snippet.title: BLEACH Rebirth of Souls – Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
ACCEPT YOUR SOUL AND REVERSE FATE.
BLEACH Rebirth of Souls is coming soon to PlayStation, Xbox, and PC!

Learn More: https://bnent.eu/Bleach-RoS

#BLEACH #RebirthofSouls #BLEACHRoS
Follow BLEACH games on Twitter: https://x.com/BLEACH_game_en

Follow Bandai Namco Entertainment America:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcous
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/bandainamcous
